page.title: 11LEISURE IN LECHLADE
page.content: {BOY} Fishing is my main hobby. I usually go fishing for pike. As well as fishing I like flying model aeroplanes. I also enjoy swimming. I like walking and cross country running. I do other sports like football, cricket and table tennis. {GIRL}Sometimes in my spare time I go for cycle rides with my dad. On other occasions I play softball with dad in our back garden. On Wednesday evenings I go to guides. At the weekends I usually play with my friends. Other things which I enjoy include knitting, sewing and drawing. {HEADMASTER}With a wife and three sons of primary school age there is little spare time for one who is a priest (non-stipendiary) as well as a teacher. However, a large garden and an allotment provide recreation and much needed exercise.
